summary: After spending three years in an asylum, a washed-up actor views a minor assignment from his old director in Rome as a chance for personal and professional redemption.
cast: Kirk Douglas|Edward G. Robinson|Cyd Charisse|George Hamilton|Daliah Lavi|Claire Trevor|James Gregory|Rosanna Schiaffino|Joanna Roos|George Macready|Mino Doro|Stefan Schnabel|Vito Scotti|Tom Palmer|Erich von Stroheim Jr.|Leslie Uggams|Edit Angold|Albert Carrier|Steve Carruthers|James J. Casino|Spencer Chan|Lilyan Chauvin|Edward Colmans|Franco Corsaro|Joan Courtenay|Joe Dante|Cilly Feindt|Bess Flowers|George Ford|Ben Frommer|James Garde|James Gonzalez|Charles Horvath|John Indrisano|Eugene Jackson|Janet Lake|Richard LaMarr|Margie Liszt|William Meader|Ann Molinari|Alberto Morin|George Nardelli|Don Orlando|Steve Peck|Red Perkins|Benito Prezia|Beulah Quo|Tony Randall|Tony Regan|Greg Rhinelander|Victor Romito|Clark Ross|Eugene Walter
title: Dos semanas en otra ciudad
